sentences.en: Data recorders also pin-point mechanical faults rapidly, reducing repair times.
sentences.cn: 数据记录仪还能迅速查明机械故障，减少维修次数。

sentences.en: Eastern Europe is rapidly becoming a dumping-ground for radioactive residues.
sentences.cn: 东欧迅速成为放射性残渣的倾倒场。

sentences.en: He had discovered politics and was rapidly becoming absorbed by it.
sentences.cn: 他接触到了政治并且迅速地对它着了迷。

sentences.en: He was 58, and his health was failing rapidly.
sentences.cn: 他58岁，身体正在迅速衰老。

sentences.en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentences.en: Once the decision was made, things fell into place rapidly.
sentences.cn: 一旦作出决定，事情就立刻顺理成章地发展下去了。

sentences.en: Outside, the light was fading rapidly.
sentences.cn: 屋外的天色很快就暗下来。

sentences.en: Some animal and plant species cannot accommodate to the rapidly changing cond-itions.
sentences.cn: 某些种类的动植物不能适应迅速变化的环境。

sentences.en: The baggage was being rapidly stowed away for transportation.
sentences.cn: 行李正在迅速装载等待运输。

sentences.en: The disease was spreading more rapidly than expected.
sentences.cn: 疾病的蔓延比预期的要快。

sentences.en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
sentences.cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

sentences.en: The trade deficit is the flip side of a rapidly expanding economy.
sentences.cn: 贸易赤字是经济快速发展带来的负面产物。

sentences.en: The vegetarian burger was an innovation which was rapidly exported to Britain.
sentences.cn: 素食汉堡是一种迅速传到了英国的新开发食品。

sentences.en: These ideas rapidly became the new orthodoxy in linguistics.
sentences.cn: 这些观点迅速成为语言学中新的正统观念。

sentences.en: They remain stranded in freezing weather and rapidly worsening conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然被困着，天气严寒，情况迅速恶化。

sentences.en: Try to rip it apart as rapidly as possible.
sentences.cn: 动作尽可能快地把它撕开。
